description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The eccentric blend of traditional, simple gameplay coupled with the new challenging and rewarding modifications that this game offers will test your wits and keep you amused for hours. Play 4 unique modes with over 5,000 words spanning 4 difficulty levels. Play a classic word game like you've never played it before! www.fileundermedia.com
